for.variableTemplate: \t/** \t * Calculate CRC over an array \t * (%variables) \t * \t * @tparam T Type of data in array (inferred) \t * @tparam N Size of data array in elements (inferred) \t * \t * @param init CRC initialisation information \t * @param data Data to calculate CRC over \t * \t * @return Calculated CRC \t */ \ttemplate<typename T, size_t N> \t%(static)uint32_t calculateCrc(const Init &init, const T (&data)[N]) %(const){ \t \t configure(init); \t \t // Write data to CRC unit i.e. calculate CRC \t for(unsigned index=0; index<N; index++) { \t %register = data[index]; \t } \t // Return result \t return getCalculatedCrc(); \t} \t\n
